experience.title: Marketing Research Assistant
experience.organization: University of Washington - Department of Communication
experience.description: Conducted extensive primary research on consumer sentiment regarding digital privacy in advertising, utilizing survey data to identify key demographic trends. Compiled comprehensive reports on competitor social media strategies for academic review.

experience.title: Market Analysis Project Lead
experience.description: Led a collaborative research project focused on the efficacy of micro-influencer marketing versus traditional celebrity endorsements. Analyzed engagement metrics across three social media platforms to determine ROI for hypothetical retail brands.

metadata.experience_level: Relevant research done for the job field.
